attributes.action: Stop local authorities introducing "pay as you throw" recycling schemes on the grounds of public health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Pay as you throw" will present a threat to public health; as people avoid charges by disposing of rubbish in other ways: fly-tipping, stockpiling, filling neighbours bins, filling public bins, recycling units and business skips with household waste. This will lead to more vermin and consequently more disease.
